mapper.sql: id AS id, procinst_id AS procinstId, model_name AS modelName, sence_versionid AS senceVersionid, in_paramter AS inParamter, out_paramter AS outParamter, execute_total AS executeTotal, type AS type, create_time AS createTime,batch_id as batchId
mapper.select: select d.version_id as senceVersionId,d.title as senceName,a.RULE_NAME as ruleName,a.RULE_DESC as ruleDesc,c.EXECUTE_RULENAME as flag from risk_rule_his_version a inner join rule_scene_version d on a.SENCE_VERSION_ID = d.version_id inner join risk_test_drools_log b on a.SENCE_VERSION_ID = b.SENCE_VERSIONID and d.version_id = b.SENCE_VERSIONID left join risk_test_drools_detail_log c on a.RULE_NAME = c.EXECUTE_RULENAME and b.ID = c.DROOLS_LOGID where b.PROCINST_ID = #{procInstId}
